channel.title: resources on Gabriel Lopez
channel.description: Recent content in resources on Gabriel Lopez

item.title: Raw Job Notes
item.description: Job Search Notes - Look at job description - Big companies have new grad type jobs but not small-medium - If small-medium show you can learn fast - apply anyway - Say "entry-level" "Associate", etc? - apply - Say 5 or less years of experience? - apply - For now if there is no label or years of experience don't apply - Can probably later tell based off of what they are asking for - Check if there is too much asked - Recruiter being dumb?

item.title: Resources
item.description: Red Team Pentesting Malware Development General Evading Antivirus Detection in C (with Dahvid Schloss) - John Hammond Description: An interesting talk John Hammond had with Dahvid Schloss for his insight on Malware development Youtube - Crow Description: A good channel I found to learn about some good hands-on info about creating malware 0xPat Blog Description: A good blog I found about creating malware and some techniques to avoid detection thecyberidiots - Dahvid Schloss Company’s blog - “Fun with PowerShell â€“ Executing commands with DNS requests”
